data.title: Luigi Pirandello
data.meta_description: Sold for $637 | Italian dramatist, novelist, and short story writer (1867–1936) awarded the Nobel Prize in Literature in 1934. ALS in Italian, one page,
data.text: Italian dramatist, novelist, and short story writer (1867–1936) awarded the Nobel Prize in Literature in 1934. ALS in Italian, one page, 5.25 x 7, May 16, 1915. Letter to a gentleman on payments owed to a person whose paternity has just been identified. Central horizontal and vertical fold, with vertical fold passing through a single letter of signature, a few creases, one lightly through end of signature, and a uniform shade of toning, otherwise fine condition. RRAuction COA.
